title: A Global family
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/AIDS (Disease)

abstract: HIV both binds us together and keeps us apart.
description: Suzanne reflects on the impacts of her HIV diagnosis and in particular coming to terms with the fact that her dream to have children would not be realised in the way that she first imagined.
